body.p: To His Excellency Beriah Magoffin Gov of Kentucky

We the undersigned citizens of Caldwell County Ky,, have long Known Thos B Wadlington & he has Ever been considered a good & True hearted citizen Known & noted for his industry & orderly conduct. The Difficulty in which he was engaged with Milton A Cartwright did not appear to us to be of his seeking nor are we satisfied that the case was presented to the Jurry as it really occurred, We hope yr excellency will review the case and give the poor man the benefit of Every Doubt and we desire, That his case may be judged in Mercy & regarded with favor & that yr Excelency will take into consideration Every circumstance that ought to opperate in his behalf And we desire that Yr Excellency may be& will be persuaded that it is consistent with Yr duty to extend to him executive clemency
& that his life may be sparred, either by a full pardon or by a commutation of his punishment --
Jany 21st 1861

Yours respectfully
Joel Beckner
